abstract_ssm: The Benjamin F. Hart papers span the period 1836 to 1843 and  consist of two documents: a certificate that certifies Benjamin F. Hart is a Master Mason of the St. Andrew's Lodge #7 of the Freemasons, dated 1838; and Hart's last will and testament, dated 1843.
corpname_ssm: Freemasons. Grand Lodge of the State of New York

name_sim: Freemasons. Grand Lodge of the State of New York
